HotelElement.Name: The Inn at the Spanish Steps

Description.Text: The Inn at the Spanish Steps is a traditional 4-star property offering elegant accommodation in the heart of Rome. Highlights include a good location near the Spanish Steps. This upscale area is dominated by the Spanish Steps, which climb a steep slope between Piazza di Spagna and the Trinita dei Monti church. Nearby places of interest include the Keats-Shelley Memorial House, Trevi Fountain, Villa Medici, numerous designer boutiques and the prestigious Via Veneto. Spagna metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Rome destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise building. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Superior rooms are 24-28sqm and decorated in an elegant style with pastel tones, modern light wood furniture and wood floors. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, a safe, tea and coffee equipment, a work desk and a marble en-suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
